summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAvene Hydrance Aqua Gel Face Moisturizer is a multi-tasking hydration powerhouse that can be used as daily care, sleeping mask, on the face, neck and eye contour.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-tasking hydration powerhouse that can be used as daily care, sleeping mask, or on the face, neck and eye contourFormulated to minimize risk of allergic reactionsWon't clog poresRefreshing gel texture soothes while detoxifying and defending against free radicalsUnique aqua-gel texture immediately transforms into water to provide 24 hours of intense hydrationSkin is left dewy, luminous and refreshedKey IngredientsCohederm patented revolutionary technology, backed by science, is the ideal lipidic trio to restore and bind moisture to the skin for enhanced elasticity and comfort while preventing water lossRestores a cohesive skin barrier and replenishes natural micro-reservoirs with Av√®ne Thermal Spring WaterHydration-Boosting Microspheres gradually release Av√®ne Thermal Spring Water and lipids for maximum skin replenishment and time-released hydrationDextran Sulfate + Pre-Tocopheryl provide free radical and pollution defense while detoxifying skinHyaluronic Acid visibly plumps and Smoothes skinAv√®ne Thermal Spring Water soothes discomfort and tightness from dehydrated skinFormulated WithoutParabenSoyWheatMineral OilAnimal derived ingredientsItem 2577168How To UseIn the morning, apply to the face, neck and eye contour. In the evening, apply in a thick later and leave-on all night.IngredientsAv√®ne Thermal Spring Water, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone, Isocetyle Stearoyl Stearate, Triethylhexanoin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Methyl Gluceth-20, Polyglyceryl010 Myristate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, BHT, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, C14-22 Alcohols, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin Seed Oil) Seed Oil, Fragrance, Phytosterols, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dextran Sulfate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Tocopheryl Glucoside, Water.
how_to_use: In the morning, apply to the face, neck and eye contour. In the evening, apply in a thick later and leave-on all night.
ingredients: Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin Seed Oil) Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Purchased several times
reviews.comments: Love this for the summer! Light and moisturizing but not heavy.

reviews.headline: Smell
reviews.comments: This lightweight moisturizer was good enough but the smell/fragrance is SO strong. It's surprising for an Avene product. I will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Delightfully Dewy!
reviews.comments: I love MOISTURE! I wish I could put this all over my body. I little goes a long way and  it completely covers my face with delightfuly dewy hydration.

reviews.headline: Returning
reviews.comments: This product is HEAVILY scented snd burned my sensitive skin. Its a no for me.

reviews.headline: Meh Moisturizer
reviews.comments:
This moisturizer does hydrate but there's some pretty big cons. 
-Not for oily skin. Leaves the skin very oily a few hours after application.
- Not non comedogenic. Caused a lot of new breakouts.
- Fragrance is strong

reviews.headline: Nice texture, but very strong fragrance
reviews.comments:
I got this in a travel size in a gift set and was excited to use it on a long weekend trip. As soon as I opened the packaging, I was hit with the aggressive smell of this product and was transported back to my grandmother applying her heavily scented products in my youth. Since I had no other moisturizer with me, I used it and my combo acne prone skin informed me that I had offended it with the noxiously scented product. My skin was irritated and my husband, who has the worst sense of smell ever, could smell this product through a couple layers of product.

So needless to say, I do not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money
reviews.comments: I had a bad experience with this cream. I have used this brand for many years because its products are made with high-quality ingredients, and it always tries to take care of the skin. But this cream, besides having a horrible and extremely strong smell, filled my face with pimples, made me look like a teenager, and dried out some areas of my face. It was a total disappointment.

reviews.headline: fragrance too strong
reviews.comments:
loved the way it made my skin feel
but can't get past the strong fragrance

reviews.headline: Light weight but strong smell and greasy
reviews.comments: The texture of the cream is very light. I like how it applies smoothly on the skin. But it has a strong baby powder smell and it makes my skin look so greasy after a while.

reviews.headline: Beautiful Formula
reviews.comments: Love this lightweight moisturizing gel cream. Also my husband always gives me compliments when he kisses my cheek because he loves the clean fresh scent of this cream.

reviews.headline: Feels so good
reviews.comments: I use several Avene products. I sometimes can't wait for this step in my skincare routine. I just love how good it feels going on.  It locks in moisture without feeling oily, too thick or too heavy.

reviews.headline: Great for Eczema
reviews.comments: This gel moisturizer seeps into the skin nicely, a little goes a long way. I have eczema, when it was super raw this did sting a little. The baby powder smell is OK, didn't bother me and I didn't love it either. This gentle yet effective for dry skin days. I love that it's non-comodogenic, for reference I have oily/dry combo skin that is acne prone.

reviews.headline: Fragrance ruins the product
reviews.comments: I wish this product was fragrance free. It has a very strong baby powder fragrance. The product itself works beautifully but the fragrance is so strong I can't use it.

reviews.headline: Please buy this wonderful God giving product!
reviews.comments: I absolutely am in love with this product it literally makes me look üëÄ like a movie star every time I put it on and did I mention that I don't wear any makeup up this product is a blessing from God period‚ÄºÔ∏èüòò

reviews.headline: Baby powder fragrance?
reviews.comments: Listen to the reviews, im not one to be picky about fragrance but the smell of this is overwhelming! Smells more like baby powder then baby powder. It did hydrate my skin but not worth the smell.

reviews.headline: It's good but fragrance makes it bad
reviews.comments: It's good but fragrance makes it bad , why us the fragrance so strong ?

reviews.headline: SO much fragrance?
reviews.comments: Smells like straight up baby powder; thought this would be more geared towards sensitive skin. Have not used a skincare product with that strong of a fragrance in so long, so unbearable I had to return. I usually try and wait things out to get the full experience and really try it out but nope. Couldn't do it.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again
reviews.comments: This is the third jar I have bought and it is really the best!

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I have hyper-sensitive and eczema prone skin. This moisturizer is so amazing and gentle and leaves my skin glowing. I use it am and pm under makeup and over night serums and I can't see ever using anything else!

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Sticky , and it's a no for me

media.headline: Hydranse Aqua Gel, is a Must!
media.caption: Hydrance Gel, I am 61

media.headline: Please buy this wonderful God giving product!
media.caption: Can't even tell how old am I üòä

faceoff_positive.comments: This product is a game changer and I am 61,excellent
faceoff_positive.headline: Hydranse Aqua Gel, is a Must!

faceoff_negative.comments: I absolutely love this cream. It delivered on every promise but the fragrance is so overwhelming. It is such a strong floral scent. I get a horrible headache from using it. I wish they made a fragrance free version- I'd buy every last jar!
faceoff_negative.headline: SO MUCH FRAGRANCE
